name: Central and Eastern European Environmental Center
goal:
Modern world is causing a number of challenges. Sometimes professionals can help to overcome them.

CEEEC is a think tank which professionally helps to deal with environment-related problems. CEEEC is involved in consultansy work, its task is also to promote transparency and public involvement.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Directive 2000/60/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23 October 2000 establishing a framework for Community action in the field of water policy)

The Floods Directive (Directive 2007/60/EC)

Directive 2008/98/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council on waste
